Class BasicConstructive

java.lang.Object
com.instancesobp.batchingAlgorithm.BatchingAlgorithm
com.instancesobp.batchingAlgorithm.constructiveHeuristic.ConstructiveAlgorithm
com.instancesobp.batchingAlgorithm.constructiveHeuristic.BasicConstructive
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BasicConstructive extends ConstructiveAlgorithm
Implements a basic constructive batching algorithm for grouping orders into batches. This algorithm processes a list of orders and creates batches based on its orden position. It supports both compact and non-compact batching strategies. Compact batching attempts to fill existing batches before creating new ones, while non-compact batching creates a new batch for each unassigned order.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sergio Gil Borr√°s

  • Method Details

    • run

      public List<Batch> run(List<Order> orderList) throws Exception
      Executes the basic constructive batching algorithm. This method processes the given list of orders, optionally sorts them using the provided sorting strategy, and creates batches based on the worker's capacity.
      Specified by:
      run in class ConstructiveAlgorithm
      Parameters:
      orderList - The list of orders to be batched.
      Returns:
      A list of batches created from the given orders.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the batching process.
